title: Yohane’s Counterattack
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Umm, Yoshiko-san.... There’s something I’d like to talk to you about....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What is it? Also, it’s Yohane.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, okay. So you see.... Umm,  Yoshi-.... Yohane-san, it’s about A・ZU・NA. Are they giving you any trouble?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh!? H-, how do you.... No, it’s nothing. They’re not really troubling me or anything. They’re my little demons, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I see. That’s good then. The other day, I inadvertently saw Ayumu-san and the others simulating how they would defend you, Yohane-san, if an army of angels came to attack....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh!? N-, no, never mind.... Kuukuku! I see they’re looking down on me!! Yohane doesn’t need my little demons to protect me. I’m going to beat up the army of angels with my magical powers alone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, you’re roleplaying....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not roleplay!!!! Listen, Shioriko.... This is only between us, but I’m sure there are those who are after my magic.... But that’s my problem. I don’t want other people to do anything dangerous. Shioriko.... you get what I’m saying, right? Will you be my ally and protect them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ayumu-san and the others are in danger!? I can’t let that slide. I may not be of much use, but allow me to help, Yohane-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yes, good girl. Then from now, you need to listen to what I’m saying!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
